positions.subtitle: MyMonty
positions.description: Driving Innovation at MyMonty: A Strategic Role in Fintech+ Strategic Partnerships:* Developed and executed strategic initiatives to drive business growth and achieve corporate objectives.* Conducted market analysis and competitive assessments to identify opportunities and threats.+ Financial Acumen:* Performed financial analysis, including forecasting, and financial modeling.* Managed financial operations with the Corp. finance team, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.+ Product Innovation:* Contributed to the development and launch of new products and services.* Conducted market research and user testing to gather insights for product improvement.+ Relationship Management:* Built and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and investors.* Negotiated contracts and agreements to ensure optimal outcomes.* Effectively communicated complex ideas and strategies to diverse audiences.
positions.title: Associate Executive Partnerships and Business Development
positions.description_html:
Driving Innovation at MyMonty: A Strategic Role in Fintech

+ Strategic Partnerships:

* Developed and executed strategic initiatives to drive business growth and achieve corporate objectives.
* Conducted market analysis and competitive assessments to identify opportunities and threats.

+ Financial Acumen:

* Performed financial analysis, including forecasting, and financial modeling.
* Managed financial operations with the Corp. finance team, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.

+ Product Innovation:

* Contributed to the development and launch of new products and services.
* Conducted market research and user testing to gather insights for product improvement.

+ Relationship Management:

* Built and maintained strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and investors.
* Negotiated contracts and agreements to ensure optimal outcomes.
* Effectively communicated complex ideas and strategies to diverse audiences.

positions.subtitle: MyMonty
positions.description: Gaining Experience at MyMonty: A Stepping Stone in the Financial Industry* Identifying & Securing Partnerships: Analyze market trends, cultivate relationships, and develop partnerships with neo-banks, fintechs, BaaS providers, and tech players that align with MyMonty's strategic goals.* Negotiating & Managing Partnerships: Collaborate with legal and business teams to negotiate win-win partnership agreements, ensuring clear terms and fostering long-term success.* Building & Nurturing Relationships: Maintain effective communication with key partners, track performance, and identify opportunities for mutual growth and collaboration.* Market Expertise: Monitor and analyze the neo-banking landscape, identifying competitive advantages, emerging technologies, and trends to inform business strategies.* Data-Driven Strategies: Develop and implement business development strategies through market analysis and customer segmentation, leveraging data to acquire and retain customers through partnerships.* Performance Measurement: Analyze and report on the performance of partnerships, using data insights to optimize strategies and ensure maximum value.* Regulatory Compliance: Maintain in-depth knowledge of relevant regulations and compliance considerations within the neo-banking sector.https://mymonty.com.lb/
positions.title: Junior Partnerships & Business Development Executive
positions.description_html:
Gaining Experience at MyMonty: A Stepping Stone in the Financial Industry

* Identifying & Securing Partnerships: Analyze market trends, cultivate relationships, and develop partnerships with neo-banks, fintechs, BaaS providers, and tech players that align with MyMonty's strategic goals.

* Negotiating & Managing Partnerships: Collaborate with legal and business teams to negotiate win-win partnership agreements, ensuring clear terms and fostering long-term success.

* Building & Nurturing Relationships: Maintain effective communication with key partners, track performance, and identify opportunities for mutual growth and collaboration.

* Market Expertise: Monitor and analyze the neo-banking landscape, identifying competitive advantages, emerging technologies, and trends to inform business strategies.

* Data-Driven Strategies: Develop and implement business development strategies through market analysis and customer segmentation, leveraging data to acquire and retain customers through partnerships.

* Performance Measurement: Analyze and report on the performance of partnerships, using data insights to optimize strategies and ensure maximum value.

* Regulatory Compliance: Maintain in-depth knowledge of relevant regulations and compliance considerations within the neo-banking sector.

https://mymonty.com.lb/

positions.subtitle: MyMonty
positions.description: Internship Experience at MyMonty: A Glimpse into the World of Fintech+ Familiarity with BaaS: I acquired an in-depth understanding of the concept of Banking-as-a-Service, its implications, and how it enables fintech companies to leverage banking infrastructure to offer innovative financial products and services.+ Market Research: I actively conducted research on the fintech industry, including digital banks and neo banks, to identify emerging trends, market opportunities, and potential challenges. This involved analyzing market reports, competitor analyses, and customer surveys.+ Regulatory Compliance: I learned about the regulatory landscape governing digital banks and fintechs, including compliance requirements such as KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML (Anti-Money Laundering). I gained practical knowledge on how these regulations impact the day-to-day operations of a digital bank.+ Partnership Development: I was involved in evaluating potential partnership opportunities with third-party providers, exploring collaborations that could enhance our product offerings or expand our customer base. I gained insights into establishing mutually beneficial relationships in the fintech ecosystem.+ Agile Methodology: I worked within an agile environment, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams in sprints, attending stand-ups, and participating in retrospectives. This experience enhanced my ability to adapt quickly to changing project requirements and work effectively as part of a team.https://mymonty.com.lb/
positions.title: Partnerships and Business Development
positions.description_html:
Internship Experience at MyMonty: A Glimpse into the World of Fintech

+ Familiarity with BaaS: I acquired an in-depth understanding of the concept of Banking-as-a-Service, its implications, and how it enables fintech companies to leverage banking infrastructure to offer innovative financial products and services.

+ Market Research: I actively conducted research on the fintech industry, including digital banks and neo banks, to identify emerging trends, market opportunities, and potential challenges. This involved analyzing market reports, competitor analyses, and customer surveys.

+ Regulatory Compliance: I learned about the regulatory landscape governing digital banks and fintechs, including compliance requirements such as KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML (Anti-Money Laundering). I gained practical knowledge on how these regulations impact the day-to-day operations of a digital bank.

+ Partnership Development: I was involved in evaluating potential partnership opportunities with third-party providers, exploring collaborations that could enhance our product offerings or expand our customer base. I gained insights into establishing mutually beneficial relationships in the fintech ecosystem.

+ Agile Methodology: I worked within an agile environment, collaborating with multidisciplinary teams in sprints, attending stand-ups, and participating in retrospectives. This experience enhanced my ability to adapt quickly to changing project requirements and work effectively as part of a team.

https://mymonty.com.lb/

experience.title: Investment Analyst
experience.description: Gaining Hands-On Experience in Venture Capital at One of the Top Venture Capital Firms in Lebanon and the Levant.* Gained exposure to the investment process: Analyzed financial documents (balance sheets, income statements, business plans) and key metrics (ROI, P&E Ratios, CAC, EBITDA) to understand investment decision-making at a leading VC firm.* Supported program development and research: Contributed to market analysis and product-market penetration strategies, fostering innovation within the Lebanese and Levant venture capital landscape.* Developed financial analysis skills: Learned to interpret financial statements, calculate return on investment (ROI), and utilize financial data for investment evaluation at a top VC firm.* Built a strong understanding of venture capital: Explored investment strategies, startup pitching/proposals, and future planning of potential investee companies.* Networked with industry leaders: Participated in company meetings and weekly briefings, interacted with entrepreneurs, business owners, founders, and C-level executives (CEOs, CIOs, CFOs, CTOs) within the Lebanese and international venture capital space.* Expanded professional network: Attended social and business programs hosted by BDD and Berytech (local organizations), and participated in online gatherings with international programs, fostering connections across the global venture capital ecosystem.
experience.description_html: Gaining Hands-On Experience in Venture Capital at One of the Top Venture Capital Firms in Lebanon and the Levant.* Gained exposure to the investment process: Analyzed financial documents (balance sheets, income statements, business plans) and key metrics (ROI, P&E Ratios, CAC, EBITDA) to understand investment decision-making at a leading VC firm.* Supported program development and research: Contributed to market analysis and product-market penetration strategies, fostering innovation within the Lebanese and Levant venture capital landscape.* Developed financial analysis skills: Learned to interpret financial statements, calculate return on investment (ROI), and utilize financial data for investment evaluation at a top VC firm.* Built a strong understanding of venture capital: Explored investment strategies, startup pitching/proposals, and future planning of potential investee companies.* Networked with industry leaders: Participated in company meetings and weekly briefings, interacted with entrepreneurs, business owners, founders, and C-level executives (CEOs, CIOs, CFOs, CTOs) within the Lebanese and international venture capital space.* Expanded professional network: Attended social and business programs hosted by BDD and Berytech (local organizations), and participated in online gatherings with international programs, fostering connections across the global venture capital ecosystem.

experience.title: Development Specialist
experience.description: Libano is a local cryptocurrency and NFT project aiming to facilitate crypto-currency money transfers under the supervision of the Lebanese Central Bank, offering lower fees than traditional methods and redirecting profits to public sector initiatives.* Financial Analysis: Conducted in-depth analysis of cryptocurrency market data to inform strategic decisions.* Business Development: Developed a comprehensive business plan for the Infrastructure Initiative, outlining strategies for growth and impact.* Marketing and Branding: Spearheaded the development of marketing materials, including logo design and brand strategy.* Team Management: Managed and coordinated cross-functional teams, including DevOps and business development, to ensure project alignment and efficiency.* Community Engagement: Initiated discussions with Lebanese diaspora, families, merchants, and government officials to build support and partnerships for the initiative.
experience.description_html: Libano is a local cryptocurrency and NFT project aiming to facilitate crypto-currency money transfers under the supervision of the Lebanese Central Bank, offering lower fees than traditional methods and redirecting profits to public sector initiatives.* Financial Analysis: Conducted in-depth analysis of cryptocurrency market data to inform strategic decisions.* Business Development: Developed a comprehensive business plan for the Infrastructure Initiative, outlining strategies for growth and impact.* Marketing and Branding: Spearheaded the development of marketing materials, including logo design and brand strategy.* Team Management: Managed and coordinated cross-functional teams, including DevOps and business development, to ensure project alignment and efficiency.* Community Engagement: Initiated discussions with Lebanese diaspora, families, merchants, and government officials to build support and partnerships for the initiative.
experience.company: Libano Cryptocurrency Coin and BlockChain Financial Services

experience.title: Development Specialist
experience.description: DAGPA is an eco-NGO dedicated to fostering environmental awareness and sustainable practices within Lebanese communities.* Community Education: Developed and delivered educational programs promoting ecological knowledge and care for the environment.* Gift Economy Advocate: Researched and presented on the application of Gift Economy principles within Lebanese society and NGOs.* Environmental Advocacy: Contributed to initiatives raising awareness about environmental protection and sustainable living habits.* Behavioral Change Strategies: Developed methodologies and incentives to encourage positive environmental behavior among Lebanese citizens.
